SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AcademicInformation
Abstract class that contains the basic information for adding and getting Academic information from a csv file.
AcademicInformationAdministrator
AcademicInformationAdministrator class This class is used to create an AcademicInformationAdministrator object It extends the AcademicInformation class It is used to add and get information from the administration.csv file It is used to check if an administrator exists in the administration.csv file
AcademicInformationStudent
AcademicInformationStudent class
AcademicInformationTeacher
This class is used to create the academic information of a teacher It extends the AcademicInformation class It is used to add and get information from the teacher.csv file It is used to check if a teacher exists in the teacher.csv file It is used to get the information of a teacher from the teacher.csv file
Administrator
The Administrator class is used to create an administrator object It extends the Person class It is used to add and get information from the administration.csv file It is used to check if an administrator exists in the administration.csv file
AdministratorMenu
The AdministratorMenu class is used to display the Administrator menu and to perform the actions that the administrator chooses.
Assignment
Assignment class is a class that stores the information of an assignment
CSVFileManager
This class is responsible for reading and writing to CSV files.
Department
Department class is a class that stores the information of a department
ExaminationBoard
Held at the end of each review period by Department to: review student progression Students may be requested to repeat a module, link-in to modules, repeat semester/year, etc.
Gradebook
Gradebook class is a class that stores the information of a gradebook
InputUtils
InputUtils class is a class to get user input
Masters
The `Masters` class extends the `Student` class and represents a masters student.
Modules
Modules class is a class that stores the information of a module.
Person
Represents a person with a name, address, phone number, and email address.
Phd
The `Phd` class extends the `Student` class and represents a phd student.
Programme
Programme class is a class that stores the information of a programme.
QCAcalculator
QCAcalculator class is a class that calculates the QCA score of a student
Student
The `Student` class is a subclass of `Person` and represents a student in the system.
StudentMenu
StudentMenu class is a class that creates a menu for the student
StudentRecordSystem
The class StudentRecordSystem is used to run the Student Record System.
StudentRecordSystemException
StudentRecordSystemException is a custom exception class that extends the RuntimeException class.
StudentResults
 
Teacher
Teacher is a subclass of Person and is used to create a teacher object
TeacherMenu
TeacherMenu class is a class that stores the information of the teacher menu
Undergraduate
Represents an undergraduate student extending the `Student` class.
